body.name: Smart Watch UMIDIGI Urun, Built-in GPS Activity Tracker for Women and Men, Fitness Tracker with Blood Oxygen Monitor and Heart Rate Monitor, 5ATM Waterproof Pedometer for iPhone Samsung. (Rose Gold)
features: 【Fashionable Smart Watch for Women and Men】 UMIDIGI Urun is a round smartwatch, 44mm in diameter, constructed by light-weight Aluminum frame. Displayed by a 1.1 inch round full color screen. Two Button on the right side together with touching screen provides smooth operating experience.

【Private Consultant for Your Health】 This Smart watch offers health monitors for you, high precision heart rate monitor and blood oxygen measuring, sleep tracking, sedentary reminder, after measuring, it will create graphs to provide visible health data for you to know your physical condition easier.

【Coach for Achieving Fitness Goals】 Unlike normal smartwatches, Urun has a individual built-in high precision GPS receiver, 17 Sport modes for your choice. It will also record heart rate monitoring data which can comparable to the heart rate belt. You could find more accurate and more detailed fitness data in Paiactive App, like GPS track, Calorie consumption, Average pace, Stride etc.

【Assistant for Your Daily Life】 After connected to your smartphone in Paiactive via Bluetooth, you can switch on notifications for most communicating apps like Facebook, Whatsapp, Skype, YouTube, Twitter, Instagram, etc. Besides, you can also check weather forecast, control music player and camera shutter in the watch.

【Reliable and Stable Quality, Wide Compatibility】 Urun passed 5ATM waterproof test, which allows you to swim in the pool without worries. High-intensity lithium battery allows you to use the watch longer, 40 days in standby time or 7 to 10 days for daily use. And it is compatible with most smartphones like Apple Xiaomi Samsung Huawei etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Technical details: Display type:1.1 inches TFT color LCD screen with 240*240 PixelMaterial: Aluminum alloyDial diameter: 44mm; Dial thickness: 12.9 mmWrist strap width: 22 mm (Standard dimensions, which can be purchased directly on the market. Make you easy to replace.)Control method: Touch screen and buttonsSuitable for wrist size: 153 mm - 230 mm (adjustable)Charging time: ≤2.5 hours (The ambient temperature is below 25 ° C)Battery: Working mode: 7-10 days; Standby mode: 40 daysCompatible system: iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or aboveApplication: PaiactiveNOTE: Please use the original charging cable to charge. If use other non-standard charging cables to cause the watch to burn out, at your own risk.

Built-in Highly Precise GPS Urun supports 2 different positioning systems: GPS and GLONASS, with a highly precise dual-satellite positioning system, hence it can enhance the positioning speed and tracking accuracy. It’s very convenient since you can check out the real-time pace and distance in the watch.Leave your phone at home and track pace and distance during runs,rides and record pace, cadence, stride length, average speed, average heart rate, etc. Collect more sport data with built-in GPS receiver in exercising, and check your workout intensity map in Paiactive app.

Sports mode: Urun Smartwatch is able to monitor the activity of 17 sports: run, outdoor walk, cycle, treadmill, indoor walking, bike, hike, climb, rower, badminton, elliptical, football, basketball, tennis, yoga, dance, train. You can also check the complete training data in the Paiactive app. It will provide good guidance for your exercise, and greatly helps to achieve goals in sports. Note: *The Urun is NOT intended as a medical device. The measurement data and results are for reference only and are not used as a basis for diagnosis or treatment. *According to ISO standard 22810:2010, the waterproof depth is 50 meters. Urun can also be used while swimming and washing hands. *All data on the page are theoretical values obtained by UMIDIGI's internal laboratory through tests conducted under the specific conditions. For more information, please check the product details above. Actual data may vary due to different products, software versions, application conditions, and environmental factors. All data depends on actual usage.

Heart Rate Monitoring Real-Time Sport Heart Rate Monitoring, record Your Every Beat. You can view your heart rate changes during exercise and optimize your exercise and track your progress. Blood Oxygen(SpO2) Monitoring With the help of the built-in blood oxygen sensor, you can simply touch to know your blood oxygen level. Notice: NOT for medical reference. Ensure that the watch is worn tightly and keep your wrist and body at a standstill during measurement. Sleep Monitoring & Health Reminders Urun monitors your different sleeping stages and awake time and helps you establish a regular bedtime routine. Also, it can remind you to drink water, have medication, and record your all-day activity.

Built-in Highly Precise GPS Urun supports 2 different positioning systems: GPS and GLONASS with a highly precise dual-satellite positioning system. It’s very convenient since you can check out the real-time pace and distance in the watch. Compass to Guide Your Direction Urun Provide you with accurate directions at any time, to tell you the right and key outdoor information, maintain your safety and help your daily schedule. It is the best choice for outdoor sports enthusiasts. Stopwatch and Timer This upgraded version supports stopwatch and countdown functions, which can help you better optimize your exercise and training.

Flashlight The Urun smartwatch has the function of a flashlight. The screen emits a certain brightness so that you can get a illumination in the dark environment. Call / message Notification Vibrate to remind you in time of anything important and display the messages directly on the watch, give you a smart and intimate reminders. Weather Forecast This feature gives you a real-time view of the day's weather conditions so you can know what the weather is like while you're out and about. It will be a thoughtful helper for traveling, dressing, exercising and travelling in your daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent budget fitness watch
reviews.reviewText: This umidigi uwatch 2s is an improvement over the original uwatch. It's like the uwatch but with a touch screen and is waterproof. I've tested the waterproof feature by running both sides of the faces under water. I'm not sure if it's water proof when swimming as advertised because swimming under water has added pressure.This watch has many different functions including heartbeat monitor, sp02 oxygen, and blood pressure measurement. The heatbeat measurement is very accurate. I compared the values of my heatbeat by hand measurement for 1 minutes with the watch value and they are exactly the same values. I do not know if sp02 or blood pressure is accurate.This watch has different modes for popular exercise and sport that you can choose so you can get the data for exercise or sport that you actually do. I do not find them usefull but for people that do these exercise, it can be very helpful.The watch is very easy to pair with the da fit app that most umidigi watch uses. After pairing with the app, you can view the weather for up to 3 days. The watch needed to be pair with the app for updated time and weather. You can set many usefull features in the app such as notifications. Some popular apps is preloaded for notifications but if you want notification from apps that are on your phone, you select the "other" options. Many of your phone apps are not shown there either.There is also sleep monitoring but it only monitor your sleep pattern from around 8pm to 8am. I slept before 8pm and the watch did not monitor my sleep. I think this is a battery saving features umidigi program into the watch. If you are looking for a watch to measure your sleep not in that time frame then this watch is not for you. Another battery saving feature that I noticed is the ability for watch to auto turn on when you moved the watch up is turn off at night. I still use the watch at 10pm to 12 am so I have to manually turn it on. I found it a little annoying.I have used the watch for 3 days at full brightness and the battery is at 73%.One feature under the setting on this watch that I think should be on every watch is the compass. I compared it with google maps and it appeared to be accurate.Overall, if you want a budget watch that does the same thing as many of the high end watches and dont want to spend $100+ then this watch is for you. It does not have mobile pay nor the ability to download apps or musics like some high end watches but this watch is not design for an all around watch. It is a fitness watch. If you are looking for those features, then this watch is not for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: UMIDIGI Uwatch3 just got ordered to replace a Casio that had died. Everything works and overall is very slick piece of hardware. Does have room for improvement, primary is that choices for watch faces are very limited. I was hoping for an analog face with digital date/time combined which is what my Casio had, and was incredibly useful to see at a glance. Not a lot of control on how the watch face looks or what is displayed. Would be nice to have more options. (would like to turn off battery percentage and just leave battery bar).Problems in app should be renamed FAQDoes not appear to have photo taking option, kinda disappointing (have iPhoneX so maybe not on iOS?)Watch band size is nice, I have large wrists and fits fine with about 3 holes left. In the past I have had to order larger bands to even wear (looking at you Fitbit)Music control works, but play/pause button does not change visually when paused, so couldn't tell if paused or music stopped playing.Expected side button to work as a back function, but quick press does not appear to do anything, long press starts it up. (could be something missed in manual - will see if can find in .PDF as always like to have manuals accessible on my phone.Magnetic charger connection is a really nice feature, easy to use and satisfying to hear the snap as it connects.Plan on experimenting with alarm function for reminders and the like, currently hidden under device as an alert which is odd since it where you also can setup alarms, would be better as a popup on the plus button if you are going to change it frequently in app which I plan to do.Manual has extremely small text, may have to upgrade my reading glasses.Could not find information about wrist band size, I have seen 20, and 22mm listed on Amazon reviews/comments but did not see in manual. Really like to have several band options. Though I readily like that it has easy off wristband pins, nice touch.Will use for a couple of weeks and if I remember (maybe if app could set alarms out beyond a week, will setup up one in reminders and see what happens), will do a follow up about daily use, battery life and all that jazz.All that being said, initial impression is very nice overall for a basic smartwatch, with some nice features.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fácil de usar y larga duración de la batería
reviews.reviewText: Es el segundo que compro de esta marca, lo que me gusta es que la correa no se está saliendo, la batería dura muchísimo y el diseño es muy bonito. En cuanto a funciones creo que tiene lo básico, contador de pasos, calorías, es fácil de usar.

I gave this a go for my 11 year old, thinking if it was rubbish or she damaged it/lost it, it wouldn't be the end of the world with the price tag. This watch is AMAZING! We have other more expensive ones in our family and this one does what they do and better in some cases and for a much more reasonable price point! Obviously the app that you use with it is being developed and has improved even in the time we've used it - translations can be funny. But really, wouldn't hesitate to recommend or buy again!
